item.description: What is a blog slug? If you have no clue, this post isn’t for you and if you want to know what it is, it is an ugly looking additional “/blog/” in the permalinks (URLs) in your website that comes free with the multisite feature in WordPress. Why ugly? Because it comes uninvited, it’s there and most probably you don’t want it. How do you remove the additional “blog” in the URL of your posts?
